Piano room - Sabaa and Sam - Sam runs song Ave Q (audio shut-down on start) Sabaa Light in Piazza Duet "Can't Help Falling In Love" Elvis Goofing on Piano Sabaa and Sam Memphis Theater - MOS Fr Memphis to Memphis NY Low key walk through "Hello, NY" Walk down 44th street stop at T-shirts holds to camera Sam OTF about being on Broadway Catching yoga in Times Square - Minskoff walk-by Sam OTF better - Happy to be back, Love to play princeton Ave Q puppetry Be what the biz it looking for - if they want you you'll be in the right spot Scariest part of putting self out there Going to auditions is the unknown
Walk from NYU dorms to Tisch - Exit/Enter building Brooke, Nathan, Sam Sabaa cross street church bells tolling into Tisch
7:00 Van Intros - Jimmy awards info, 1st time in NYC? (hands up) the Burrows
7:12 Intro coaches to Keisha - you're on - stays seated Take care of your voices, take care of your bodies I will push you past your limit and push more - Allow yourself to learn, be you - break through resolve in break down, we'll pick you up
7:15 The lights go up 1 day - breaks a bit - something works, trust us you'll never forget anyone all in 4 days take the ride, enjoy, no regrets, live it. Welcome to NHSTA (clapping)
7:16 Van - seated does history of Jimmy's FFward to Sun. night in this room, judges serious Boray Brass - Not snarky judges Kent montage Memphis Rachel Hoffman Bernie Telsa
Van - keep yourself centered, remember choreography
7:21 Intros (profiles) Sabaa, Evan, Brittany 7:30 Levy, Sam, Chase, Nicolette 7:32 Brooke, Nathan, 7:42 Michael warm up 7:50 voice warm up, group in circle Behind Michael see kids telling rat pack Ethel Merman story 7:53 Full Face Michael (no audio) kids laugh talking about fitting them to voices - high tenors etc. Sabaa, Brittnay
8:03 They sing words with Michael Spoken "Look at Me I'm King of NY" (from behind his head head on) 8:11 Picking sopranos, altos they sing Brittany's group then all woman mixed *funny moment by soprano volunteers
Guys - tenors, 2nd tenors, baritones
20:30 Michael Moritz "King of New York" all voices Fascinating Rhythms Rehearsal -break- 20:37 "Gee, I'd like to be on Some Marquis" Kids faces singing CU's "Ragtime" CU's Brooke CU Sam Evan "Falling"
20:45 Great version -all "King of NY" Various singles, doubles for Opening Medley 21:00 Finale run through 22:15 Michael CU pans to kids Running open medley through "Fall" seated applause at the end 22:30 Michael jokes oh, have to back off those sopranos it's like Annie died and went to heaven same opening medley -standing 22:35 Assist gives them dress code - no flip flops - what's happening tomorrow medley's and coach groups

pbcoreDescriptionDocument.pbcoreTitle: Second day Rehearsals, Medleys and Solos, Coaching and Choreography
pbcoreDescriptionDocument.pbcoreDescription:
see also physical log
8:35 Michael Moritcz warms up seated kids Annie - Fascinatin' Rhythm Cutaways kid faces sing - listen Nick Waseleski Sam at end of row Brittney, Sabaa - 8:53 Nathan and Kid yawn Jesus Christ superstar roll - stand - from the top - "This might Be a Forte" piano moment he said sheepishly M. Moricz - Sam rolls eyes More moved w/ music, wides, pans *great pans with music 9:04 Keisha in special awareness is your key to success "don't yawn in my face" Keisha lines up kids - come right here 9:06 How many Joshua's are there? jokes, two kids hi-five 9:12 focus! Keisha gives their positions - bottom of stage will rise (ooooh!) rack focus stage 9:14 Can we get down on one knee? You just yawned in my face Josh You're going to turn with your chin 9:15 from the top 9:16 there's no talking in between - 25 pushups! I have no patience 9:18 Kiesha: UP! gestures - don't talk - everytime you do it - don't talk, don't ask questions Kiesha makes fun of their jump 9:20 Good, follow, look at me - Peter Lambert you're doing brilliantly (see Wide on E camera) all applaud 9:22 Good Keisha goofing faces - then cues them down the line Feet shots 9:24 Great low angle of pop ups end on good feet "Minute by Minute" 9:26 Kiesha "Please don't talk we wasted 10 seconds we can't do this!" 9:27 Defining moment comes from your soul - it starts now! Antone can sing it's "WHY you do it 9:29 Good CU of Keisha gesturing "stand up" 9:30 Chloe is looking around on "NY" - don't 9:30 K wipes brow 9:32 Good Kiesha and Brittany laughing - Kiesha holds her shoulder - Back Keisha, I only heard this once - you have to run and plant your feet Kiesha: What foot?
